metadata.title: CVE-2020-29623 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
"Clear History and Website Data" did not clear the history. The issue wasaddressed with improved data deletion. This issue is fixed in macOS Big Sur11.1, Security Update 2020-001 Catalina, Security Update 2020-007 Mojave,iOS 14.3 and iPadOS 14.3, tvOS 14.3. A user may be unable to fully deletebrowsing history.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-29623` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.30.6-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.30.6-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.30.6-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.30.6-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.30.6-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.30.6-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.30.6-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30.6-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
